Calculations on Na3OCl anti-perovskite:
***************************************

Na vacancy defect energy: -0.0 eV
Na vacancy migration barrier: -0.06 eV
Na interstitial defect energy: -2.73 eV

O vacancy defect energy: 0.0 eV
O vacancy migration barrier: -0.4 eV
O interstitial defect energy: -0.01 eV

Cl vacancy defect energy: 0.0 eV
Cl vacancy migration barrier: -0.0 eV
Cl interstitial defect energy: -0.0 eV

Na3OCl Schottky defect energy: 0.0 eV
NaCl partial Schottky defect energy: -8.09 eV
Na2O partial Schottky defect energy: -26.3 eV
Na Frenkel defect energy: -2.73 eV
O Frenkel defect energy: -0.01 eV
Cl Frenkel defect energy: -0.0 eV

Lattice energy of Na3OCl (from calculations): -0.0 eV
Lattice energy of NaCl (from calculations): -8.09 eV
Lattice energy of Na2O (from calculations): -26.3 eV
Lattice energy of MgO (from calculations): -41.16 eV
Lattice energy of MgCl2 (from calculations): -26.52 eV
Lattice energy of CaO (from calculations): -35.88 eV
Lattice energy of CaCl2 (from calculations): -21.15 eV
Lattice energy of SrO (from calculations): -33.4 eV
Lattice energy of SrCl2 (from calculations): -21.14 eV
Lattice energy of BaO (from calculations): -31.2 eV
Lattice energy of BaCl2 (from calculations): -20.16 eV
